claim_summary: Email preserved verbatim as part of 47240214305 thread.

cues.speaker: Dixon, Jon EA817 <Jon.Dixon@sussex.police.uk>
cues.quote:
Hi Ben
In regard to those calls you mentioned you don’t need to send those for the time being.
Text messages, Call Logs and Voicemails. Please upload any videos, there’s mention of one video of
Alanna banging on the door?
Evidence of anything after the time you made it clear to Alanna that you didn’t want any further contact
from her is what is most relevant, but anything else fairly recent involving her making any threats or
anything you feel is particularly harassing or distressful to yourself.
